channel.title: Black Screen 718/742
channel.description:
Basically, players run my jar client & it loads up, whatever. & then they login & they get stuck on "loading please wait" / Black - screen, this is because the cache is loading...
Is there a way to make the cache load up while the client loads so the black screen will be prevented?
